name: International Exhibition London 1902

reverse: A woman with a robe holds branches while leaning over the central disc with inscription.
description: Edward VII's coronation was held on August 9, 1902.
There does not appear to be much information about this medal.
Perhaps the delays in the coronation affected the release of this medal?
This medal is not engraved on the reverse.
